I agree with @nkoenig proposed solution. Standard officially documented support (CamelCase in this case) is mandatory. I also consider a good thing provide somewhat "backward compatibility" with the current method (and display a deprecated message) or made it to fail if none of the new supported methods was defined.

Quite dangerous would be stop supporting the uppercase values and fail silently to the default.

@hsu I would consider all software non following the standard as buggy, and reported an upstream bug as such.

@nkoenig @gerkey I can take care of this, feel free to assign it to me.
